name: DSDrive
description:
DSDrive V1.0

DSDrive is a simple racing game. You can choose between three different racetracks and have to compete against ten opponents. In the box you can change the tires, refuel, adjust the brakes and adjust the wing angle. There are three different types of weather. Different views are possible.

Controls:
 Game engine:

Castle Game Engine - Castle Game Engine

Feel free to rate the game and leave a comment.  :-)
